record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, DECEMBER 17, 2007, AT 10 A.M.
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, DECEMBER 17, 2007, AT 10 A.M. -- (Senate - December 14, 2007)

[Page: S15706]

speaking.paragraph: I now ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 5:20 p.m., adjourned until Monday, December 17, 2007, at 10 a.m.
